channel.title: RT on Rob Barry
channel.description: Recent content in RT on Rob Barry

item.title: How Russia Today Skirts High-Tech Blockade to Reach U.S. Readers
item.description: After 2016, social-media companies tried to limit the reach of RT, as it is now known. Instead, the outlet has been boosted by a news aggregator dominated by conservative publishers, including National Review, The Daily Caller and Newsmax. Read the full story here.
